participant_1.background:
I have a crib made of sustainable materials in my baby's nursery.
I like the weather to be a bit cooler so I can enjoy my late night walks and football games.
I just fed my dog.
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag to my friends about my delicious home grown vegetables.
i am a cat person.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons.
i like to create art.
I bought a book for myself and my cats to read together.

content.text: I'm good, I just woke up. It's still early. I'm a night owl.
I'm not a morning person either. I just got my baby's crib delivered last night. It's made out of sustainable materials.
That's awesome! I love that. I'm a big fan of sustainability. I grow all of my own vegetables at home.
That's awesome! I wish I had the time and space to do that. What kind of vegetables do you grow?
I grow tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, squash, and zucchini. I also have some herbs.
That's really impressive. I'm so impressed by people who can do that. I'm a bit of a black thumb.
It's not as hard as you think. You just need to water them and give them some sun.
I'll take your word for it. I'm not very good at keeping plants alive.
You should give it a try. It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that. I've got some time on my hands now that I'm on maternity leave.
That's great! You should have a lot of fun with your baby.
Thanks! I'm really excited to be a mom.
I bet you are. It's a great experience.
